flawed_nl_solution:
He got 200*0.9=<<200*0.9=180.0>>180.0 RSVP
Of those only 180.0*0.8=<<180.0*0.8=144.0>>144.0 people showed up
So only 144.0-10=<<144.0-10=314.0>>314.0 got him gifts and hence need thank you cards.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 134.0, not 314.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
